45.eng-name: The Book of Oaths (qasamah), Retaliation and Blood Money

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Safwan bin Ya'la that his father said:"I went on the campaign to Tabuk with the Messenger of Allah, and I hired a worker. My hired man fought with another man. The other one bit him, and his front tooth fell out. He went to the Prophet and told him about that, but the Prophet considered it to bin vain

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى عَطَاءٍ فِي هَذَا الْحَدِيثِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Differences Reported From 'Ata' In This Hadith
